attributes.action: acknowledge there are musicians more worthy of an honour than any member of Oasis
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Oasis produced one and a half good albums.

All rock and indie music does not stem from people listening to Mr. Gallagher's works, it stems from people being creative and talented enough to make music, hopefully without attempting to be a bad imitation of The Beatles.

Noel Gallagher does not deserve to be honoured.
